screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ui4jd file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: UI4JD file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Minecraft Bedrock Edition add-ons ( .MCPACK files) allow players to alter the game's gameplay or UI. Project 4JD UI is an add-on that allows players to revert the game's current UI to a previous version, referred to as the 4JD Legacy Console UI.

Project 4JD UI is distributed as a .ZIP file, which players must rename to use the .mcpack extension before they can install it. This ZIP file contains all the add-on's constituent files, including resources and configuration files. Many of these configuration files are saved with the .ui4jd extension.
